trans-unit.source: Provides a control for viewing flow content in a continuous scrolling mode.
trans-unit.target: 提供在連續捲動模式中檢視動態內容的控制項。

trans-unit.source: FlowDocumentScrollViewer shows content in continuous scrolling mode.
trans-unit.target: FlowDocumentScrollViewer 顯示連續捲動模式中的內容。

trans-unit.source: A similar control, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, shows content in page-at-a-time viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 類似的控制項， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>，會顯示內容頁-一次檢視模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> and FlowDocumentScrollViewer are fixed to a particular viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 同時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>和 FlowDocumentScrollViewer 會固定為特定檢視模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes (as provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> enumeration), at the cost of being heavier weight than <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> or FlowDocumentScrollViewer.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>包含可讓使用者以動態方式選擇各種不同的檢視模式的功能 (所提供<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>列舉型別)，但要付出正在較重的加權比<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>或 FlowDocumentScrollViewer。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows a FlowDocumentScrollViewer control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示其預設的 FlowDocumentScrollViewer 控制項[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer") By default, a vertical scrollbar is always shown, and a horizontal scrollbar becomes visible if needed.
trans-unit.target: ![螢幕擷取畫面︰ 基本 FlowDocumentScrollViewer](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "螢幕擷取畫面︰ 基本 FlowDocumentScrollViewer")依預設，永遠顯示垂直捲軸，而水平捲軸會顯示如有需要。

trans-unit.source: The default [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for FlowDocumentScrollViewer does not include a toolbar; however, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible%2A> property can be used to enable a built-in toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 預設值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]的 FlowDocumentScrollViewer 不包含的工具列中; 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible%2A>屬性可以用來啟用內建工具列。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> is the only allowable child element for a FlowDocumentScrollViewer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>FlowDocumentScrollViewer。 唯一允許的子元素</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: A FlowDocumentScrollViewer element may host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>.
trans-unit.target: FlowDocumentScrollViewer 項目可以裝載不超過一個<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Cancels any current printing job.
trans-unit.target: 取消任何目前的列印工作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level can be decreased.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>可以降低層級。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A> method decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>方法減少<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>層級所指定的數量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is subject to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值的值受限於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level can be decreased; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>層級可以降低，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level can be increased.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>可以增加層級。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A> method increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>方法增加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>層級所指定的數量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is subject to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值的值受限於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A>

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level can be increased; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>層級可以增加，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoomProperty"></xref> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoomProperty"></xref>相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 執行<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*>路由傳送命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*>

trans-unit.source: The DecreaseZoom method decreases the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: DecreaseZoom 方法則會減少目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>層級所指定的值由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>屬性會傳回`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref> that hosts the content to be displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref>裝載要顯示的內容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref> that hosts the content to be displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"> </xref>裝載要顯示的內容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Toggles the **Find** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 切換**尋找**對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: By default, Ctrl+F provides a keyboard shortcut for toggling the **Find** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，Ctrl + F 會提供鍵盤快速鍵來切換**尋找**對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows the **Find** dialog on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> with default UI.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示**尋找**對話<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>UI 的預設值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog") The default **Find** dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**.
trans-unit.target: ![螢幕擷取畫面︰ FlowDocumentScrollViewer 尋找對話方塊](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "螢幕擷取畫面︰ FlowDocumentScrollViewer 尋找對話方塊")預設**尋找**對話方塊包含讓您輸入搜尋文字欄位，以及按鈕**找下一個**，**找上一個**，和**選項**。

trans-unit.source: The following **Find** options are provided by default: - Match whole word only - Match case - Match diacritic - Match kashida - Match alef hamza
trans-unit.target: 下列**尋找**預設會提供選項:-比對全字拼寫須-符合大小寫比對變音符號-比對 kashida-比對引 hamza

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a horizontal scroll bar is shown.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否顯示水平捲軸。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref> .
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"> </xref> 。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 執行<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom*>路由傳送命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom*>

trans-unit.source: The IncreaseZoom method increases the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: IncreaseZoom 方法會增加目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>層級所指定的值由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A> property
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用，如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the control does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>控制項沒有焦點時，會顯示選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> does not have focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>顯示選取的文字時<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>沒有焦點，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsInactiveSelectionHighlightEnabled*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsInactiveSelectionHighlightEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> has focus and selected text.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>具有焦點和選取的文字。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>顯示選取的文字時在文字方塊中沒有焦點; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsSelectionActive*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsSelectionActive*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否選取項目內之內容的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>已啟用。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示該選取項目已啟用。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>工具列會顯示。

trans-unit.target: ![螢幕擷取畫面︰ FlowDocumentScrollViewer 的工具列](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-toolbar.png "螢幕擷取畫面︰ FlowDocumentScrollViewer 的工具列")根據預設，此工具列不會顯示。

trans-unit.source: Called when a printing job has completed.
trans-unit.target: 列印工作完成時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Invokes a standard **Print** dialog which can be used to print the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> and configure printing preferences.
trans-unit.target: 叫用標準**列印**可以用來列印的內容對話方塊<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>並設定列印喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] does not provide a **Print** button.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]不提供**列印** 按鈕。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows an example of a standard **Print** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示的標準範例**列印**對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: Note that the specific appearance of the **Print** dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，特定的外觀**列印**對話方塊會根據主機服務的電腦組態而有所不同。

trans-unit.target: ![螢幕擷取畫面︰ 列印對話方塊](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "螢幕擷取畫面︰ 列印 對話方塊")

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得所選的內容的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Selection is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 選取項目是在.NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The selected content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所選的內容的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選取的文字會反白顯示的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the brush that highlights selected text in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> by setting the SelectionBrush and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定會反白顯示所選取的文字的筆刷<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>藉由設定 SelectionBrush 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: A brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 反白顯示所選取的文字的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>的不透明度

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectionOpacity to 0, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is transparent and is not visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將 SelectionOpacity 設定為 0，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>透明，看不到。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectionOpacity to 1.0, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is opaque and the selected text is not visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將 SelectionOpacity 設定為 1.0，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>是不透明，而且所選取文字不是可見。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: The opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>的不透明度

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.4.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 0.4。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity*>

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否顯示垂直捲軸。

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current zoom level.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前的縮放層級。

trans-unit.source: The zoom level is constrained by the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 縮放層級由的值限制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 目前的縮放層級，以百分比解讀。

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.0 (a zoom level of 100%).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 100.0 （100%縮放層級）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zoom increment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示比例增量。

trans-unit.source: The zoom increment is the percentage by which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level is increased or decreased when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> commands are executed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 顯示比例增量是百分比<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>層級會增加或減少時<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A>執行命令，分別。</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 目前的縮放增量，以百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.0 (zoom increments by 10%).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 10.0 （10%的顯示比例增量）。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
